name: Metal CN
tag_list: metal-laser-cutting, metal-bending, shearing, poinonnage, pliage-mtal, soudure-montral, mtal-en-feuille, dcoupe-laser
overview:
Metal C.N. Inc. is a manufacturing company located in the Montreal area that specializes in the transformation of sheet metal by shearing, laser cutting and welding using CNC machinery.

Established in 1992, Metal C.N. Inc. has 20 years of experience in the processing and shearing of sheet metal providing customers with parts specifically suited to their needs. Our company completes your custom projects using three-dimensional computer-aided design and laser cutting, punching, shearing, bending, MIG and TIG welding, spot welding and assembly.

Dedicated to providing high quality laser cutting and shearing services, Metal C.N. Inc. is equipped with high performance machinery and regularly upgrades its equipment to stay on the cutting edge of technology.

Metal C.N. Inc. Engineering

The engineering team at Metal C.N. Inc. has extensive experience in the production of simple or complex parts from sheet metal. The production department is completely computerized and uses specialized Solidedge and Metalix software. In addition to this, monitoring of the production takes place in real time using a production control and job tracking system (MIETrak).
